disc: Elite's been around Colombo for years, but now they've expanded their service to Wattala as well. They serve Chindian (Chinese and Indian) food.
directions: It's onto your left soon after you pass the Mabola Mosque, if you're heading towards Negombo.

name: Christine's
disc: A home-cook that's make seasonal Christmas pudding.
directions: Bullers Lane is opposite Rupavahini. If you're coming down Bauddhaloka, you pass Arcade Independence and then turn just before Torrington. Christine's is a house just past Aura, on the opposite side.

name: China Manor
disc: China Manor is a new hotel in Maradana with an authentic Chinese restaurant. Their crispy chicken is amazing.
directions: It's right next to CineCity.

name: Chambers
disc: A lawyer's chambers turned Moroccan/Italian restaurant, they do their own take on moussaka, hummus and baba ghanoush.
directions: From the Fort entrance, take Church Street and keep going. Pass the Church, pass the Commercial Bank, and it'll be to your left.

name: Barista Lavazza (Laksala Thummulla)
disc: Having been around since 2002, Barista is one of the first coffee shops to have popped up in Colombo.
directions: It's right opposite the UN at the Thummulla Junction, sharing the same land as Laksala.

name: Cookies & You
disc: Cookies and You claims to deliver Love at First Bite, and they live up to this promise. Their baked goods taste as great as their Instagram feed looks.
directions: Near Mondy.

name: Townhouse by &Co
disc: They're supposed to be a tea room, but they serve rice & curry, lamprais and other random stuff.
directions: Liberty Arcade is just a few metres past Liberty Plaza on Duplication Road. Townhouse is on the ground floor.

name: Kamrose Restaurant (Panadura)
directions: If you are coming on Galle road from Colombo side it's just 100m ahead from Panadura base hospital on your right hand side

name: The Coffee Bean and Tea Leaf (Galle Road)
disc: Serves coffee, frappes, shakes, and a bunch of baked goodies.
directions: It's right near 5th Lane. Landside on Galle Road.

name: Sri Ariyabawan Hotel (Borella)
address: No. 42, D. S. Senanayake mawatha, Boerlla, Colombo 08
directions: Next door of NoLimit

name: Hotel Bankshall
disc: Open from the crack of dawn till midnight, this is a great, clean rice-and- curry stop with quail on the menu.
directions: From Main Street, turn onto St John's Road and take a left onto Bankshall Street.

name: Hulftsdorp Streetfood
disc: A street with a wide variety of food in the center of industrial Colombo. Find everything from mutton brain curry to devilled cuttlefish eggs.
address: Abdul Hameed Street, between Quarry Road and Oilman's Street
directions: If you're going along Armour Street, turn left down Srimath Bandaranayake Mawatha and turn left

name: Galle Fort Hotel
disc: One of the Fort's quintessential spots for accommodation and breakfast.
directions: It's right in the heart of the Fort, just next to the All Saints Church

name: Food (Pelawatta)
disc: Food         .                    .
directions: Go on main road from Pelawaththa to Thalawathugoda. After passing Nagahamulla tank just go about 100m ahead. Wadi Food is on your right hand side.

name: Chapter One
disc: With a great setting, decor and beautiful presentation, Chapter one disappoints when it comes down to execution.
address: 931C,  Ethul Kotte Road (Off Parliament Road), Ethul Kotte
directions: From Kotte Road, head towards Sri Jayawardenepura Mawatha, and it'll be to your left, just after the petrol station.

name: Park Street Trattoria
disc: Park Street Trattoria is the newest addition to Park Street's fancy repertoire of restaurants. They've got a beautiful space, but the food has definite room for improvement.
directions: From Vihara Maha Devi (along Dharmapala Mawatha) turn down Park Street. If you go all the way to the roundabout and turn left there's parking.

name: Lords (Negombo)
disc: One of Negombo's long term dining institutions.
directions: It's on the main Negombo bar strip

name: Thulasi Hotel (Badulla)
address: Thulasi Hotel, Udaya Raja mawatha, Badulla.
directions: If you are coming on Kings Street turn in to Udaya Raja mawatha which is on your right hand side. You can see Thulasi Hotel in front of you on the other side of the road.

name: Down Town Rotti Hut (Ella)
address: Ella Village Inn, Down Town Rotti Hut, Ella
directions: Just walk 20m ahead from Ella town to Ella railway station side. Rotti hut will be on your right hand side.

name: Sentosa Cafe
disc: Sentosa is a Singaporean restaurant which seems to focus more on Malaysian fare, but also serves In
directions: It's right next to Saskia Fernando's Gallery, and shares the same premises as a bar and an Italian/ French fine dining restaurant.

name: The Stairway
disc: An attic converted into a cafe, The Stairway is a new spot in the Fort run by a resident. Good rice and curry.
directions: Take Church Street from the Fort entrance and keep going and pass Pedlar Street. It'll be to your left.

name: Makye Ame
disc: A mix of authentic and Sri Lankanized Chinese food, run by the friendliest Chinese lady.
directions: From Galle Road, turn onto Vajira Road. It's just there on the right hand side.

name: New Gadaby Rest Inn (Kaththankudy)
disc: Home of the best beef samosa. Gadaby is perfect for your short eat fix on the East Coast.
directions: From Batticaloa, head down the main road into Kaththankudy. If you hit Seylan Bank, you just missed it.

name: Scarlet Room (Colombo Courtyard)
disc: The Scarlet room is Colombo Courtyard's Italian restaurant. Their all red theme may not appeal to some, but we found the food to be surprisingly affordable. Execution was a mixed bag, with a few dishes missing the mark and others doing quite well.
directions: Scarlet Room is at Colombo Courtyard, located on Duplication Rd, just passed the British Council. It's technically in Colpetty but in reality it's much closer to Bambalapitiya.

name: Mr. Biriyani (Hulftsdorp)
disc: Biriyani, fried chicken, and burgers.
directions: Drive down Armour Street and turn into Srimath Bandaranayake Mw, then turn left into Abdul Hameed Street. It's almost directly opposite the mosque.

name: Flow Health Bar
disc: Flow Health Bar is a vegan health food stall in Ward Place that serves up a range of salads and healthy juices. Their stuff is undoubtedly healthy; however, their menu can be a bit confusing and their food just wasn't as flavoursome as we hoped.

name: Il Cielo
disc: New rooftop Italian fine dining restaurant behind Gangaramaya Temple
address: The Goldblock, 5th Floor, 101/11 Hunupitiya Lake Road,Colombo 2, Sri Lanka
directions: After passing Gangaramaya Temple on your left going towards Beira Lake, take the first left after the temple. Head down this road and it's opposite a warehouse  with a colourful mural.

name: Hot Cabin (Diyatha Uyana)
disc: Hot Cabin.      .      .             .
directions: Near the start (main road side) of Diyatha Uyana Food Court.

name: Gorgeous Cakes
disc: A home baker who specializes in something other than cupcakes and cookies.
directions: Just give them a call to get directions to the pick-up location

name: Mune's Kalu Dodol
disc: Mune's Kalu Dodol is one of two places that we know of, that delivers high quality dodol to your doorstep.

name: Green Grass Hotel and Restaurant
disc: One of the better eateries in Jaffna, with a wide variety of Northern Sri Lankan food
address: No. 33, Aseervatham Lane, Hospital Road, Jaffna
directions: Head towards the Jaffna Railway station from Hospital Street, and the hotel is in the lane adjoining it.

name: Bakeology
disc: A homebaker based in heart of Colombo 7 who specializes in peanut butter jelly cookies.
address: 7 Barnes Place Residencies, Barnes Place, Colombo 07
directions: From Town Hall, head towards Nelum Pokuna and turn left onto Barnes Place. It's to your left.

name: Brownie & CO.
disc: Brownie pizzas.
directions: They deliver

name: Big Mama's
disc: Big Mama's does Dutch food like lamprais, bolofiado, fougeti and olliebollen with a Sri Lankan twist.
address: Off Chandra Wettasinghe Mawatha,Koswatte Road, Nawala
directions: From Nawala Road, turn onto Koswatte Road at Koswatte Junction, then keep on the lane until you see Chandra Wettasinghe Mawatha to your right. Call up their number for more directions.

name: RTM Delights
disc: RTM Delights       .

name: Pelican Restaurant (Kalutara)
directions: Pass the Salgadu bakers and keep going about 20m. Pelican will be on your left hand side at the bend of Sarananda mawatha.

name: Grand Solis
disc: A bar and restaurant that's great for its ambiance if you live in Nawala.
directions: It's right on Nawala Road at the Koswatte junction. If you're coming from Rajagiriya it's to your right, otherwise it's to your left. Its white facade is reminiscent of a casino.

name: Jetwing Kaduruketha (Restaurant)
disc: Whipping up some mouthwatering Sri Lankan and Western/ Fusion cuisine, Kaduruketha's restaurant is elegant and mouthwatering.
directions: Drive straight along the Cmb-Batti Highway from the Wellawaya Junction, and then turn left at Aluth Paara. Take another left turn about 4kms in, and you're there.

name: Isso
disc: Isso deals with isso. Curried isso, tossed isso, isso with roast paan, and isso with bathala chips. Yes.
directions: If you're going down Jawatthe Road from Thimbirigasyaya, turn left. Isso's on the right, right where the old Cakery was. You can't miss it.

name: Mongolian BBQ (Majestic City)
address: Mongolian sea food, B 1, Majestic city, Colombo 04.
directions: At the MC food court.

name: Liberty Plaza Vending Machine
disc: One of Sri Lanka's first vending machines, residing at Liberty Plaza.
directions: It's on the Ground Floor, near Bata and the escalator.

name: Mlesna Tea Fortress
disc: A monolith of a building on the Colombo-Kandy road with decent food and plenty of great tea.
directions: You'll find it on the main Colombo-Kandy road, near the Kiribathkumbura junction. The stone "fortress" walls are impossible to miss!

name: Nihal's (Jetwing Lighthouse Club)
disc: The main restaurant at the luxe Jetwing Lighthouse Club in Galle, serving up special degustation menus and bespoke dishes.
directions: The Lighthouse Club is just a smidgen further down the main road from Lighthouse Hotel, and right opposite Jetwing Kaduruketha.

name: Pegasus Reef (Restaurant)
disc: A city hotel in the depths of Wattala. Rather nice place, but mediocre food and service.
directions: Turn into the Kerawalapitiya Road from Hendala and follow the Pegasus signboards to Prithipura Road. Go almost all the way down until you reach the hotel.

name: Grand Indian (Grand Hotel)
disc: Grand Indian is Nuwara Eliya's go to Indian restaurant . They serve up top notch North Indian cuisine at reasonable prices with impressive consistency.
directions: Turn into Grand Hotel Rd from the Victoria Park roundabout and make your way up about 100m. Grand Indian is just past Hotel Glendower.

name: Blue Tan
disc: Blue Tan is one of the restaurants in Heritance Negombo, a gigantic new luxury hotel along Poruthota Road.

name: Sidarang Fresh Fruit Juice
disc: A nice little place that serves  good fruit juices for a really low cost.
directions: Step in to Sri Uttarananda Mawatha and at the roundabout, take the 3rd exit onto St Michaels Rd.

name: Scrumptious Wedding Cakes
disc: Soft, moist cupcakes and cakes that are a good value for money.

name: Cosy Restaurant (Jaffna)
disc: A hotel and restaurant, Cosy's dishes up Sri Lankan, Indian, and Chinese cuisine. We'd recommend sticking to the Jaffna specials. Obviously.
directions: Walk down Stanly Road keeping the Nagavihara Buddhist Temple onto your right, and the hotel is a few metres down the road to your left, a bit past Akshathai.

name: The Grill (Kingsbury Hotel)
disc: An elegant dining space that serves up steaks, grills, and more.

name: Olive's Kitchen & Grill
disc: A restaurant down Marine drive that serves Chinese and Indian cuisine.
directions: Head towards Dehiwala side on Marine Drive, and it is few meters ahead of Global Towers Hotel.

name: Dineinn
disc: An Indian restaurant  down  W. A. Silva Mawatha, with  quality food and great service. They cater mostly to rich, north Indian dishes ranging from  the traditional Murg Makhanis to garlic naan.  Dhum biryanis and delicious Raithas.
address: No 47 W. A. Silva Mawatha, Wellawatha, Colombo 6
directions: From Galle Road, turn onto Ramakrishna Road. It's just there on the left hand side.

name: Bliss Lounge
disc: Bliss lounge is a Mediterranean sheesha lounge which serves Italian and burgers, among other things.
directions: Bliss is directly above Snog on Duplication Road (Bambalapitiya), just passed Mithuro Cafe, right opposite the Supun Super Center.

name: Al-Maas
disc: A mainstream Indian restaurant that caters  to an assortment of dishes, ranging  from Chinese, to the odd Macaroni, quail, speciality egg dishes and submarines.

name: Eastern Wok
disc: Eastern Wok is a multi-cuisine restaurant that serves Chinese, Indian and Arabian food.
directions: Located adjoining The Sizzle down Walukarama Road in Colpetty.

name: Bubblelement (Colombo)
disc: Bubbly stuff and paninis and desserts.
directions: Turn to your right into Queen's Road just after passing the British Council.

name: Dinemore (Moors Sports Club)
disc: The go-to place for submarines since 1996.

name: Sun Hill Restaurant
disc: A compact place with many options of Sri Lankan Chinese food.
address: 26, Palymyrah Avenue, off Marine Drive, Kollupitiya
directions: Head towards Kollupitiya side on Marine Drive, and it is few meters ahead of HUA XIANG JU restaurant.

name: Tea Avenue (WTC)
disc: Tea, waffles, cakes and more. Tea Ave initially opened up at Barnes Place: and this is their second (and newest) branch.
address: Level 03, East Tower, World Trade Centre.
directions: It's at the WTC, which you can't miss. Third Level, onto your left.

name: Dottie's English Tea Room
disc: Dottie's is a charming English tea room serving up tea, fry-ups, and desserts on intricately delicate china and lace with a side of great service.
directions: It's just next to the French Embassy, on your left as you drive down towards Kynsey Road.

name: Ru's Kitchen
disc: A home baker who specializes in amazing brownies. She also makes savory goodies.

name: The Fishery (Pegasus Reef)
disc: An excellent seafood restaurant in a rather out-of-the-way location, paired with great service.
directions: Turn into the Kerawalapitiya Road from Hendala and follow the Pegasus signboards to Prithipura Road. Go almost all the way down until you reach the hotel.

name: Round Island
disc: Round Island is a new restaurant that serves some kickass Modha (AKA Barramundi/Asian Sea Bass) dishes!
address: 20, Shady Grove Avenue, Castle Street, Colombo 08
directions: Turn in to Shady Grove Avenue and head straight down.

name: Panaash
disc: A  petite little shop that houses mouthwatering little sweet treats down Havelock Road. They specialise in a wide variety of Indian sweetmeats and savouries.
address: No: 245, Havelock Road, Colombo 06(Opposite Havelock City)

name: Urban Green
disc: Nice, cosy cafe with nice, recycled furniture and a shaded terrace.
directions: Turn in to St. Anthony's Mawatha from R. A. De Mel Mawatha and then, turn in to the 3rd by-lane on the left.

name: Beehive by RnR
disc: Beehive by RnR is a restaurant anchored at the Racecourse complex with one of the most unique interiors.
address: Racecourse Complex, Philip Gunewardena Mawatha, Colombo 07
directions: Take the stairs from where McDonald's is at.

name: Mabroc Bubble Tea
disc: Great bubble tea, plenty of flavours, and super value for money.
address: Mabroc Bubble Tea, Liberty Plaza Food Court, Duplication Road, Colombo 03.
directions: Liberty Plaza is right at the Colpetty Junction.  Walk down to the food court, it's right in front of the elevator.

name: Kandoori (Beruwala)
disc: The original Kandoori before it branched out to Colombo (or so we were told).

name: Cravings Cakery (Home Baker)
disc: Cravings Cakery is a home-based baker that whisks up phenomenally artsy cakes.

name: Havi Restaurant
disc: The cabanas thatched with coconut leaves at the Havi Restaurant make a beautiful setting that only gets more amazing as the evening lights come on. With the greenery all around you, this is a good place for a chilled out time.
directions: Pass the Buddha statue at Madiwela Junction on Pita Kotte  road and keep going about half a Kilometer to Pita Kotte side. Havi will be on your left hand side.

name: The Sooriya Village
disc: A hamlet designed to bring together the two most loved things - music and food.
directions: Right before Havelock City's entrance from Skelton Road, Colombo 05.

name: Let's Brunch
disc: All sorts of weekend brunch treats by the coast, Continental and Lankan.
directions: This is the same premises as Fat Crab.

name: The Grill by Paan Paan
disc: It's all about that char-grilled goodness.
directions: You can either turn left into Lorenz road from R.A. De Mel Mawatha or turn right/left (depending on which direction you're driving in) from Layard's Road.

name: Mrs. Flogesteen's Pork
disc: Mrs. Flogesteen's Pork makes exclusively pork based dishes upon orders.
directions: This is on the corner where Haig Road meets Marine Drive. They are inside the Don's Deli.

name: The Lounge (Cinnamon Lakeside)
disc: The Lounge is located at the Lakeside lobby and will serve you almost anything from coffee to dessert to sandwiches.
address: 115, Sir Chittampalam A. Gardiner Mawatha, Colombo 02
directions: The Lounge is at the lobby.

name: Dumplings.lk (Home Baker)
disc: Dumplings.lk is run by a Ukrainian home baker. We decided to try their Ukrainian-style Chicken Dumplings.

name: Dolce Italia (Rajagiriya)
disc: Dolce Italia has opened up a new branch at Rajagiriya, and they do great pizzas!
directions: It's right across from the Harcourts Pharmacy and Rajagiriya mosque.

name: Slightly Chilled
disc: Quirky name, location with a near-aerial view of the city, and great food, more people need to know about Slightly Chilled.
directions: Drive all the way around the Kandy Lake along the road which leads to the Lewella Junction. Slightly Chilled is in a lane to your left, on a little hill.

name: Earls Passikudah
disc: The warm reception we received on arriving at Earl's was an early indication of how good a time we were going to have there.  Only a short walk away from Passikudah beach, this friendly and comfortable little hotel will serve you well.
directions: Turn left and keep going for about 100m from Kalkudah junction

name: Machang (Pasikuda)
disc: Machang is a great place to get your booze on out there on the Pasikudah strip, with large space and a single strip of concrete tables on the side that was open to the sky.
directions: Turn left from the Kalkudah-Valaichchenai Road onto Pasikuda Road and continue on. You'll see the neon Machang sign on your right, next to the Earl's Pasikuda.

name: Graze Kitchen (Hilton Colombo)
disc: The Hilton's brand new multi-cuisine restaurant and buffet.
directions: It's to the right of the main lobby.

name: Kuuraku Colombo
disc: Kuuraku is the latest addition to Colombos Japanese scene and easily one of the best restaurants that came out this year.
address: 48B Park Street Mews, Park Street, Colombo 2
directions: Kuuraku is on Park Street, right behind Cafe Francais.

name: Ahinsa Restaurant and Guest House
disc: A reasonably priced touristy restaurant in Sigiriya. It gives off Ella vibes.
directions: It's a short walk from the entrance to Sigiriya.

name: Copper Chimney (Prof. Stanley Wijesundara Mawatha)
disc: A little hole-in-the-wall that serves the cheapest, most minimal, rice dishes.
directions: As you turn into Prof. Stanley Wijesundara Mawatha from Philip Gunewardena Mawatha, it's immediately on your left, right on the bend, hidden in a little copse of trees.

name: Saffron Kitchens
disc: A small buth kadey down St.Michael's Road in Kollupitiya. Less variety nevertheless the food is of good quality.
directions: Located right at the opposite side of BOC Merchant Tower.

name: the KAFE (Hotel Nippon)
disc: Hotel Nippon reopens and brings back their famed mutton rolls and other delicacies at the KAFE
directions: It's a little way past the Rio Cinema and AIA Insurance building.

name: Liberty Plaza Food Court
disc: Located at the basement of Liberty Plaza, the  food court houses restaurants catering to different cuisines.
address: Basement, Liberty Plaza, R.A. De Mel Mawatha, Colombo 03
directions: You can either enter from the carpark or take the escalator down from the 1st floor.

name: Samanala Restaurant
disc: Affordable (hence usually crowded) place to have a drink in Pitakotte.
address: Pitakotte - Talawatugoda Rd, Sri Jayawardenepura, Kotte
directions: At the Kimbulawala junction.

name: Cafe Fort
disc: A surprisingly  decent little cafe that's been around for a while located right next to the Dutch Hospital in Fort. They serve up some good rice and curry so it's a nice place to drop by when you're around the area during lunch time.
directions: It's right next to Hospital Street. There's a large red sign that says 'Cafe Fort' and it's impossible to miss.

name: The Bavarian Garden (Water's Edge)
disc: A German restaurant at the Boardwalk's outdoor premises.

name: Thai Express
directions: At the Majestic city food court

name: The Keg (Excel World)
disc: A pub and restaurant located inside the Excel World.
directions: This is right inside the Excel World.

name: Sugar Bistro & Wine Bar (ODEL)
disc: The Sugar Bistro & Wine Bar has set up shop amongst the swanky cafes in the newly revamped ODEL foodcourt.
directions: The ODEL department store is right down Alexandra place, in Town Hall.

name: Bamboo Room
disc: The Bamboo Room is a new restaurant that is a part of the Hotel Nippon, specialising in Kerala Cuisine.
directions: It's a large colonial style building on Kumaran Ratnam Mawatha and it's difficult to miss.

name: Black Pepper
disc: Latest seafood in Colombo, specializing in crab and peppery dishes!
address: 62/6, Dutch Hospital Square, Chatham Street, Colombo 01
directions: It's located right opposite & Co (The Steurt)

name: Jamaican Chicken
disc: A random hole-in-the-wall shop selling full and half portions of grilled chicken. Alas, definitely NOT Jamaican Chicken.
directions: It's almost directly opposite the British School.

name: Jasmine Song Restaurant
disc: Kandy's finest Sri Lankan Chinese Restaurant is now open in Mount Lavinia.
directions: Land side of Galle Road, opposite Mount Lavinia Court Complex.

name: AYU (Movenpick Hotel Colombo)
disc: The brand new Movenpick Hotel Colombo's all-day dining restaurant.
directions: It's the shiny tall building right nex to LB Finance when you turn off Galle Road onto Colpetty Junction. Opposite the market.

name: Kurundu
disc: Kurundu serves food and drink but their selling point is the chilled-out vibe they have.
directions: It's set in a little corridor like entryway in Pedlar's street. The giant lanterns hanging outside make it hard to miss.

name: Aasife Biriyani
disc: Aasife is good place to get biriyani in Ethul Kotte. The food is good and service friendly.
address: 939, Ethul Kotte Road, Sri Jayawardana Pura, Rajagiriya
directions: It's right next to Burger King on Ethul Kotte, towards the end of the byroad leading to Rajagiriya.

name: Alhambra (Ramada)
disc: Alhambra is the Ramada Hotel's North Indian restaurant.
address: Ground Floor, No. 30, Sir Mohamed Macan Markar Mawatha, Colombo 3
directions: Take the right turn at the Galle Face roundabout (right after Inn On The Green), and Ramada will be on your right where the old Holiday Inn used to be.

name: Calorie Counter (Galle Fort)
disc: Sri Lanka's only health food chain now has a branch within the artsy Galle Fort.
address: 56, Lighthouse Street, Galle Fort, Galle, Sri Lanka
directions: It's on the junction of Pedlar Street and Lighthouse Street

name: Umbrella Art Cafe
disc: A small cafe along Passara Road in Ella ran by a lovely Russian couple.
directions: About 800m on Passara road from Ella junction, Umbrella Art Cafe is on your right side.

name: Closenberg Hotel
disc: Apparently built among the ruins of a Dutch fortalice, the Closenberg Hotel is an exquisite Colonial structure dating back to the 1800s.
directions: Closenberg Road is between Galle and Unawatuna. There's a fork in the road with a police station in the middle of it, take the left fork and drive to the end.

name: Lobby Bistro (The Kingsbury Luxury Serviced Apartments at Platinum 1)
disc: The bar at the Kingsbury's luxury serviced apartments in Colombo 03. Available for short stays or long term rent.

name: Happy Burger
directions: Near by ICBT Campus at Nugegoda

name: Cafe Noir
disc: Cafe Noir is the definition of good vibes and great coffee. For real.

name: Chiminiya
disc: A buth kadey down Perahara Road, Colombo 03. Quite popular, quite good.

name: Lavinia Bakers
disc: The newest addition to the Lavinia Restaurant now serves Chinese, Indian and Sri Lankan food.
directions: It's right at the junction of Palam Thuna traffic-lights, onto your left.

name: Bella's Kitchen
disc: Bella's Kitchen is a breakfast and lunch delivery service that which we found pretty convenient.

name: Salty Swamis Cafe & Surf Shop (Hikkaduwa)
disc: A chic little seasonal Surf Cafe on Hikkaduwa's busy beach strip.
directions: The cafe is right opposite the famous Vibrations.

name: BreadTalk (Mount Lavinia)
disc: BreadTalk has opened their sixth outlet in Sri Lanka to the suburbs of Mount Lavinia.

name: Life Food
disc: A cosy cafe that dishes out healthy and yummy food and drinks: kurakkan roast paan sandwiches, salads, granola, juices and the likes.
directions: This is just at the turn-off to Alwis Place, opposite the Beira Lake.

name: Mambo's Hikkaduwa
disc: One of Hikka's oldest and most established beach restaurants & bars

name: Bubbluscious
disc: The only bubbly place that serves bubbly desserts as well. Plus, chilled out decor!

name: B-Leaf
disc: Probably the best buth kade you'll find around Boralesgamuwa.
directions: If you're coming from Colombo to Boralesgamuwa on the Colombo-Horana road,  B-Leaf is just before the Rattanapitiya junction on your right.

name: Belmio Pizza
disc: Belmio is a pizzeria in Thalawatugoda that serves up easily the best pizza in the area. They also deliver fast.
directions: From Thalawatugoda junction, head towards Madiwela on Madiwela Road, and it will be to your left.From Kotte, head towards Thalawatugoda, and it will be to your right.

name: Rasa Bojun (Kollupitiya)
disc: A small eatery at Kollupitiya junction, that serves up  good Lamprais, rice and curry items.

name: Calamari (C Negombo)
disc: An outdoor beachfront restaurant in Negombo.

name: The Sushi Bar (Samurai)
disc: The Samurai Sushi Bar has finally established themselves here in the Big City (they're in Rajagiriya, but still).
address: 226, Sri Jayawardenepura Mawatha, Sri Jayawardenepura Kotte
directions: It's the floor above the Rajagiriya Bread Talk.

name: My Burger
disc: One of the oldest burger spots in Nugegoda serving burgers and cheese kottu.
directions: In front of the Glitz, Nugegoda.

name: Free Water
disc: There are two taps here that dispense free, drinkable water.
directions: This is in front of Independence Arcade, on Bauddhaloka Mawatha

name: Cherries
disc: A tiny, comfortable shop which serves waffles, ice-cream, and fruit juices.
directions: It's almost right opposite Colombo Courtyard.

name: The Waffle Cafe
disc: A great place to get some delicious savory waffles as well as some sweet ones.
directions: It's right at the middle of Perehera Mawatha to your left, overlooking the Beira Lake.

name: Harpo's Pizza (Mount Lavinia)
disc: The newest addition to Harpo' s Pizza is now opened at the suburbs of Mount Lavinia.
directions: As you pass Mount Lavinia junction, it is just there on the land side.

name: Hoppers (London)
disc: A funky (and very popular) new restaurant in London serving up hoppers. Yes, our  Lankan hoppers.
address: 49 Frith St, Soho, London W1D 4SG, UK

name: Snow Monkey (Food Station)
disc: A great place to cool off. Pun intended.
directions: It's at The Food Station on Vinayalankara Mawatha.  From the ODEL roundabout head past Hayley's and turn just before Union Chemist.

name: Gihans Family Restaurant
disc: A great place for a quick lunch or dinner.
address: 68, S De S. Jayasinghe Road, Kohuwala Dehiwala, Colombo
directions: To your right coming from Dehiwala in the Hospital Road.

name: Momo's by Ruvi
disc: Authentic and affordable food, complete with a chef who knows his dishes.
directions: In a small lane, opposite MC.

name: Olive Garden Restaurant and Bakers
disc: A popular spot in Malabe where you can drop in for a fine quick bite.
address: No. 162/24, New Kandy Road, Pittugala, Malabe

name: 668 Chinese Seafood Restaurant
disc: Yet another Chinese Restaurant in Colombo that dishes out authentic Chinese cuisine.

name: Seafood Shack
disc: A great place for some crispy fish n chips!

name: Silk Route
disc: A new place in Malabe for fine dining with an amazing rooftop view.
directions: On your left, couple of blocks ahead of Malabe Fab in the Renaissance building which houses the Commercial Bank branch as well.

name: Ponnusamy Non-Veg Chettinad Restaurant
disc: A non-vegetarian South Indian Chettinad restaurant on Horton Place.
directions: A little road right opposite the Lakshman Kadiragama Institute.

name: The Vegan Kitchen by Sulo
disc: All your favorite food, vegan and healthy!

name: Bellissimo Cafe
disc: With a cozy peaceful atmosphere, it's a great place to have some coffee and get some work done.
directions: Pass Giovanni's and turn right onto Fire Road. Coming down the road, it will be on your right, opposite Hansa Coffee.

name: Seven Eleven Restaurant & Bar
disc: A good place to booze with delicious food, pool games and calm chat.
address: Seven Eleven Restaurant & Bar,No. 531,Capital Mall,Thalawathugoda
directions: At the first floor of Keels building.

name: Fat Panda
disc: A multi-cuisine casual restaurant off Marine Drive, with a whole range of fusion Asian fare.
directions: Sea Avenue is just off Marine Drive, the road before Whight & Co.

name: Cafe Bagatalle
disc: A great place for some healthy meals.
address: No. 18 Bagatalle RoadColombo Sri Lanka

name: Thiru Murugan's Food Waves
disc: An Indian vegetarian restaurant with an extensive menu of North and South Indian cuisine.
directions: To your right on Kandewatta Road which is opposite Wetland Park.

name: Star Dogs
disc: Star Dogs is a hotdog stand that's been lurking at MC for a while now. We dropped by to see how they're doing.
address: Majestic City, Food Court, Bambalapitiya, Colombo 04
directions: It's at the food court at MC. If you're leaving, you'll see a small stand next to a neon light that says STAR DOGS. Walk past swiftly and don't look back.

name: Karapincha
disc: A great spot for authentic Sri Lankan cuisine.
directions: Adjoining Concord Grand Hotel.

name: The Leaf Lamprais
disc: Home-delivered Sri Lankan Lamprais.

name: The Colombo Food Court
disc: A great place to have some fine Sri Lankan rice and curry in the heart of Colombo.

name: Moksha
disc: A vegetarian friendy place for all your Indian sweet tooth cravings.
directions: Right opposite ICBT City Campus.

name: The Cabinet (Hotel Nippon)
disc: The bar and lounge of historic Hotel Nippon
directions: It's a large colonial style building on Kumaran Ratnam Mawatha, a little way past the Rio Cinema and AIA Insurance building.

name: Taste of Asia (Slave Island)
disc: Taste of Asia is a very affordable favourite at Slave Island.
directions: This is located right in front of Nawaloka OPD.

name: Mr. Pepper
disc: A tiny food joint at Kalubowila that dishes out great Tandoori Chicken Biriyani. They make homemade pizza too.

name: Pronto Pizza
disc: A little Italian place in Kelaniya that serves fine thin crust pizza, freshly from a clay oven.

name: Burger Hut
disc: Burger Hut; the popular family restaurant chain at Kandy has opened their newest outlet to the suburbs of Dehiwala.

name: Cafe by Boo
disc: A little gem hidden between street joints, serving cheesy kottu and delicious pasta for affordable prices.
address: No 23, Sri Soratha Mawatha, Gangodawila, Nugegoda.

name: Ceylon Cafe
disc: A part of the Grande Gourmet restaurant, now serving Sri Lankan food.

name: Romano Italian Kitchen
disc: An ideal place for authentic Italian pizza if you're in the area.
directions: It's about 350m from the Pita Kotte junction, onto your right.

name: Ceylon Tea Lounge
disc: The Ceylon Tea Lounge serves up a bunch of different types of teas and sandwiches.
address: No 281, Ground Floor, R A De Mel Mawatha
directions: It's next to Stone N' String on R A De Mel Mawatha.

name: Tropical Bliss
disc: New spot for fresh juices to beat the heat and fruity ice cream.
address: No. 63 D.S. Fonseka RoadColombo, Sri Lanka
directions: As soon as you turn into  De Fonseka Road, it'll be on your right.

name: Taco Bell
disc: Tex-Mex here is too fast food-like for our liking
directions: It's on Horton Place, right before The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf.

name: Tropical Fresh
disc: Fresh fruit juices but bad service and ambience.

name: Frosty Roll
disc: A new rolled ice-cream place inside the Pearl of Asia Mall.
directions: Located right inside Pearl of Asia Mall, which is next to Excel World.

name: Kaha Bath Gedara
disc: Best yellow rice and curry you will ever have!

name: Barista (World Trade Center)
disc: A Barista outlet at the bustling WTC.
address: Level 3, World Trade Center, Bank of Ceylon Mawatha, Colombo 01

name: Diner's Lounge
disc: A new multi-cuisine restaurant in Kollupitiya.
directions: Turn left on Galle Road to Palmyrah Avenue.

name: Honey Beach Club (The Kingsbury Hotel)
disc: A chill pool bar and lounge overlooking the Indian Ocean.
address: The Kingsbury Hotel, Janadhipathi Mawatha, Colombo 01

name: The Savoury Monkey
disc: A home baker in Sri Jayawardenapura specialising in both sweet and savoury treats.
address: Kurundha Mawatha, Cemetery Road, Sri Jayawardenapura, Kotte.

name: Rice Box
disc: A new Thai place adjoining Steam Boat and Naniyori in Nawala.

name: Gelato Italiano by Roots
disc: Gelato is a new ice cream boutique at MC, managed by Roots.
directions: It's right next to Roots's main outlet at the MC Food Court.

name: Hangover Cafe (Mirissa)
disc: Feed your hangover at this colourful cafe right across from the beach!

name: Urban Cafe
disc: A new Chinese restaurant on the second floor of the New Colonial Hotel.

name: Cafe Seventy Seven
disc: A small pastry shop for an evening snack and iced coffee.
directions: It's right next to Coffee Bean on Maitland Crescent.

name: ARO
disc: ARO Cold Pressed Juices are all the rage now. We tried out a few of their concoctions and are convinced we're now walking beacons of prime health.

name: Sugarcube
disc: Sugarcube is the newest cafe to grace Duplication Road. With its cutesy and warm ambience, it was an instant favourite!
directions: It's down Duplication Road. Just look out for the bright yellow door and little patch of fake grass.

name: Chasis
disc: Good place to have a western type dinner with  a little chat.

name: Coco Veranda (Nawala)
disc: One of Colombo's most popular coffee shops has opened up in Nawala.
address: No. 441, Nawala Road, Sri Jayewardenepura Kotte.
directions: It's a few meters from Kirimandala Mawatha, onto your left, before Keells.

name: The RoadHouse
disc: A food truck serving quality kottus using locally sourced ingredients and Lankan inspired flavours.
address: Hotel RoadMount Lavinia, Sri Lanka

name: Brasserie (Movenpick Hotel Colombo)
disc: A classy French restaurant perfect for business lunches, dates, and other occasions that require you to impress somebody.

name: Shangahi Restaurant
disc: A nice place to eat tasteful Sri Lankan Chinese at very low price.

name: Let's Taco
disc: Colombo's first dedicated taco spot!
address: 33 A, Dr Lester James Peiris Mawatha, Colombo 05.

name: King Chef Restaurant
disc: A nice place to eat Asian food  while having a chat with friends or ...

name: Classy Cuisine (Caterer)
disc: Classy Cuisine is a home caterer who specialises in Pakistani, Indian and Sri Lankan cuisine.

name: Cakes & Bakes Restaurant
disc: The newly opened Cakes and Bakes Cafe has been creating some hype so we wanted to see if the new restaurant would also have the potential to succeed in the future.
directions: Go down Galle Road, past Holy Family Convent and before Majestic City.

name: Rasembula
disc: Rasembula gives the vibes of a rural cottage, but their food didn't live up to the expectations.

name: Mr Burger
disc: Mr Burger is a new burger joint down Bambalapitiya. Most of their burgers are so-so, but we love their Quarter Pounder.
address: It's right next to the bike shop at Galle Road.

name: Tagine
disc: Tagine is a new restaurant that shares the same building as Pho Vietnam. They  claim to serve Authentic Moroccan Cuisine, but it's really just a mix of dishes from various Middle Eastern/North African regions.
directions: It's on the 2nd floor of the building that Pho's at.

name: King Taste Restaurant
disc: King Taste is one of the many restaurants in Colombo that dishes out Chinese cuisine with a Sri Lankan twist.

name: Thejan Hotel
disc: A great place to eat rice & curry and tasteful Sri Lanka Chinese.

name: The Cauldron
disc: A coffee shop with an affordable and tasty take on Sri Lankan classics, and a nice location.
directions: From High Level Road, turn down Stratford. It's past Gandhara and Shakasz. You can park on Stratford Terrace, but it's better to take a cab here.

name: Pedlar's Inn Pizzeria
disc: The Pedlar's Inn Pizzeria dishes out a few mediocre pies at costly rates.
directions: It's the little cafe adjoining Pedlar's Gelato.

name: The VoV Coffee Lounge
disc: The VoV Coffee Lounge is a little eatery at Wellawatte that serves up 100% vegan food. They're fairly priced, the food is tasty and their burgers are sure to satisfy.

name: CASA Italia Sri Lanka
disc: CASA Italia Sri Lanka is a small Italian restaurant that serves up some good wood-fired, thin crust pizza, and has the cosiest, homey ambience.
address: 04, Samagi Mawatha, Rajamaha Vihara Road, Sri Jayawardenepura Kotte

name: Nine 11 Restuarant & Coffee Shop
disc: NINE11 is a popular spot down Stanley Thilakaratne Mawatha that serves up some okay food, but the heavy price tag is problematic.

name: Kottu & Co
disc: A stall at Food Station that does kottu and iced milo all day.
directions: From the ODEL roundabout, go past Eye Hospital and Hayley's then turn left.

name: Newprema
disc: Best place to try uncommon kinds of Kottu.

name: Dinemore (Kandy)
disc: Dinemore is one of the most popular local franchises in Sri Lanka.

name: Walking Path Cafe
disc: Formerly known as The Canteen, The Walking Path Cafe hasn't changed much at all but their hoppers are still good.
directions: Walk straight down the path from the fountains.

name: Cajun On Wheels
disc: Cajun On Wheels is a Singaporean franchise that serves good seafood, at a price.
directions: It's near Independence Arcade, on the opposite side of the street, just before Torrington Ave.

name: Jadi Samaga Game Kema
disc: A great place to eat delicious, authentic Sri Lankan rice & curry.

name: Krua Thai by Dao
disc: Krua Thai is a brand new street food joint at Galle Road. Although they claim they're a street food type place, they've got a nice seating area and whatnot. We loved it!
directions: It's right next to the Torana music shops.

name: Jasmine Song
disc: A decent Chinese restaurant in Kandy
address: 169, E L Senanayake Veediya, Kandy, Central Province 20000

name: World Spice
disc: Rather mediocre food court in the Kandy City Center that serves Thai, Chinese, Italian and Indian cuisine.
address: Level 4, Kandy City Center, Sri Wickrama Rajasinghe Mawatha, Kandy 20000
directions: On the top floor of the Kandy City Center

name: Frozsta Kandy
disc: Frozen yoghurt place and coffee shop rolled into one

name: Blue Lagoon (Jetwing Lagoon)
disc: Blue Lagoon restaurant serves nice and surprisingly affordable food in a magnificent venue.
directions: In Thalahena, on a thin stretch of land next to the Negombo lagoon.

name: Monsoon
disc: Excellent South-East Asian cuisine in a beautiful and buzzing location.
directions: Park Street is just off Dharmapala Mawatha, opposite the park. The Mews is a walking lane, you can park around back.

name: Piyoran
disc: An awesome place for pure vegetarians.

name: Sasha Food Court (Kurana)
disc: A one-stop shop on the way to/from airport or to your getaway.

name: Aththamma
disc: Aththamma at Pelawatte is a nice place to grab some authentic Sri Lankan rice and curry for a cheap price. They're known for their super tasty Ambul Thiyal curry.

name: Kabeer & Sons, Malay Cuisine
disc: Kabeer & Sons is a family run business that has been around for decades. They serve delish, authentic Malay cuisine such as babath and kodal babath, that's cow intestine and stomach lining if you didn't know.

name: Spisia
disc: Spisia is one of the  most popular restaurants in Piliyandala area, that serves up some good Sri Lankanised Chinese food.

name: Dots Bay House
disc: A cafe/hotel/performance/community space on Hirikeytiya beach, Dots Bay House wears its multiple identities with casual confidence.

name: The Soya Center (Kandy)
disc: Great, cheap soya-based food.

name: Subway (Mount Lavinia)
disc: The Subway franchise opened their second outlet in the suburbs of Mount Lavinia.

name: El Janah
disc: Serving a wide range of cuisines, El Janah is a popular spot at Mount Lavinia. Their food isn't super authentic, but quite worth the affordable price tag.

name: TACOCAT
disc: Wordplay and visuals aren't the only clever things at TACOCAT.
directions: Tacocat is located on the premises of Black Cat Cafe, it's a pop up for now and might move to a new place soon, we'll keep you posted

name: Double Cheese Coffee & Dine
disc: Double Cheese Coffee & Dine is one of the finest family restaurants in Dehiwala area that dishes out a range of Sri Lankan and European food for an affordable price.
directions: From Dehiwala junction, turn on to Hill Street, and drive for 850 meters. It's at the left hand side of the road, right in front of the Healthguard pharmacy.

name: Mona's Kitchen
disc: Mona's Kitchen is a popular spot down Pannipitiya road, that dishes out a range of Italian and Sri Lankan cuisine.

name: Side Walk Cafe
disc: Good place to try snacks even lunch.

name: Taste of Asia (World Trade Center)
disc: Taste of Asia at World Trade Center is a pocket friendly place to grab some delicious Sri Lankan snacks.
address: World Trade Center, Bank of Ceylon Mawatha, Colombo

name: The Kitchen Galle Fort
disc: The Kitchen serves tasty European fusion food in a refreshingly breezy outdoor setting at the Galle Fort.

name: Salaka Senkada
disc: Salaka Senkada one of the most popular rice & curry spots in Union Place. They serve up some ok-ish rice & curry for a decent price tag.

name: Longmen
disc: Good place to try Thai, Malay style pork & sea food.

name: Roots Gelato (Crescat Boulevard)
disc: Root's version of artisanal Italian ice cream. They do a pretty good job.
directions: It's at the Crescat Food Court, towards the car park.

name: Cookie Bar
disc: A home-baker who makes some great cookies and cookie cups.

name: Kurumba
disc: A juice bar in Narahenpita that does juice right, for a really good price

name: Central Beach Restaurant, Mirissa
disc: A decent restaurant with good food and coffee on Mirissa beach

name: Arthur's Pizza Express
disc: Thin crust fusion pizza to satisfy the Sri Lankan tastebuds.
directions: It's right before the OM Space.

name: Jolly's Ice Cream (Dehiwala)
disc: Jolly's Ice Cream has opened their latest outlet in the suburbs of Dehiwala.
address: 147, Galle Road, Arpico Super Center, Dehiwala

name: Baguette
disc: The best bakery in town for fresh French baked goodies.
directions: It's right next to Hercules Tailors on Thimbirigasyaya.

name: Shang Palace (Shangri-La Colombo)
disc: Shangri-La's signature restaurant, serving a range of traditional Chinese cuisine.
directions: It's on the 3rd Floor of the hotel. Take the left when you get off the elevator.

name: Aroma Restaurant
disc: Aroma Restaurant is one of the most popular dining spots in Wattala that offers good food for a decent price tag.

name: Kushmi Foods
disc: A takeout  Kade with a vast verity of Sri Lankan food.
directions: About 500m towards Colombo from the Dehiwala flyover, this is on the right-hand side (land-side).

name: Frosties
disc: A wide range of premium flavored rolled ice cream. Best way to beat the heat.
directions: It's right opposite TV Lanka on Ratmalana Road.

name: Gemi Uyana
disc: A buth kade serving decent packs throughout lunchtime.
directions: It's right opposite McDonald's on Galle Road.
